name: Escape
_source: s;Alpin;Come on, everyone, don't get left behind!{w} If we lose anybody, t-then...{w} I-I...{w} just d-don't get left behind!
s;Shayla;Pft.{w} I could keep fighting, but...{w} fine.{w} I guess we're running for now.
s;Raelin;...{w} get away...{w} Have to...{w} get away or...{w} or else I-I...{w} Oh, Goddess...
s;Carlin;If there's already this many here, then...{w} Goddess, our home...{w} Will there even be anybody left?

s;Elwynn;Keep running, all of you!{w} Follow my lead, and don't get lost, aye?{w} Goddess...{w} you watchin' up there?{w} I'm gonna keep 'em safe.{w} I'm gonna do it right this time.{w} Just watch me.
s;Laisren;Alpin...{w} I'll find you.{w} Wherever you are, I'll find you and get you out.{w} On my honour as a knight, no harm shall befall you or our family.
s;Elspeth;Our families are somewhere out there.{w} Together, we can do it.
s;Corridon;I'm getting too old for this...
s;Ailsa;Raelin...{w} Auntie's coming for you.{w} I still have a promise to keep.
s;Orla;Hah!{w} Hardly even a challenge!{w} Is this the best these imperial hounds can do!?{w} Pathetic!
